siyera liyon ,[3] nila washayen siyera liyon janarajaya, yanu eesana desin giniyawata,ginikona desin layiberiyawata saha niritha desin athlanthik sagarayata mayim wu batahira aprikanu rataki.gharma kalapiya deshagunayak aathi ratak wana siyara liyonaye parisaraya wasi wananthara wala sita sawana bim dakwa wenas we.warga kilomitara 71,740 nathahoth warga sathapum 27,699 [4] pura pathirunu mulu bhumi pramanayak sahitha mema rata bhugoliya kalapa hatharakata beda atha.uthuru palatha,nagenahira palatha,dakunu palatha saha batahira pradeshaya eewa wana athara mema kalapa nawatha disthrikka 14 kata beda atha.

in anathuruwa eya kotas satharakata wenkara palamuwani kotasa natha dewalayatath, dewani kotasa wishnu dewalayatath , thunwani kotasa katharagama dewalayatath, satharawani kotasa paththini dewalayatath ee ee dewalayanhi basnayaka nilamewarun ha kapumahathwarun idiriye bedadenu labe.in anathuruwa ee ee dewalayata athaku pitin wadamawana ‘kapa’ ema dewalayanhi kapa situwimata niyamitha sthanaya kaha diyara iswa, gokkolin ha maldamin sarasa, uduwiyan ha watathira bandawa suba muhurthiyen kapa thanpath karanu labe.
